name: House-Made Chicken Orzo Soup
serverNotes: Light, comforting Italian soup with tender chicken, orzo pasta, vegetables in savory broth. Perfect starter for any meal. Pairs well with crisp white wines like Pinot Grigio, Sauvignon Blanc, or Italian whites. Great with light beers.

name: Jumbo Shrimp Cocktail (4)
description: Served with house-made cocktail sauce. 1/2 Dozen 19.99 • Dozen 38.99
serverNotes: Classic appetizer with jumbo shrimp, house-made cocktail sauce. Fresh, clean flavors. Pairs beautifully with Champagne, sparkling wine, Sauvignon Blanc, Chablis, or dry Riesling. Also great with crisp lagers or pilsners.

name: Single Meatball & Marinara
serverNotes: Creamy burrata with fresh mozzarella, tomato, ricotta salata, basil. Light, fresh Italian classic. Pairs perfectly with Italian whites like Vermentino, Pinot Grigio, Soave, or light Italian reds. Also great with Prosecco.

name: Clams Casino
serverNotes: Classic baked clams with crispy breadcrumb topping, bacon, peppers. Rich, savory. Pairs excellently with Sauvignon Blanc, Italian whites, Chablis, or sparkling wines. Crisp lagers also complement well.

name: Fried Calamari
serverNotes: Crispy fried calamari with cherry peppers, lemon, marinara. Light, crunchy texture with bright acidity. Pairs great with Pinot Grigio, Vermentino, Sauvignon Blanc, or sparkling wines. Perfect with crisp lagers or Italian beers like Peroni.

name: Pan Seared Octopus & Sausage
description: Marinated octopus prepared sous vide, served with polenta, Italian sausage, peppadew peppers, and arugula.
serverNotes: Tender sous vide octopus with Italian sausage, creamy polenta, peppadew peppers, arugula. Bold, sophisticated flavors. Pairs excellently with Italian reds (Barbera, Chianti), rosé, or crisp whites like Vermentino. Bold ales work well too.

name: Roasted Pork Belly
description: Calabrian chili, honey, butter, pickled onion, savory granola.
serverNotes: Rich, crispy pork belly with spicy-sweet Calabrian chili, honey, pickled onion, savory granola. Complex flavors. Pairs well with off-dry Riesling, Gewürztraminer, sparkling wines, or Italian reds. IPAs complement the spice nicely.

name: Crispy Pork Meatballs
serverNotes: Crispy pork meatballs with sweet-sour apricot glaze (agrodolce). Italian comfort food with unique flavor. Pairs nicely with Italian reds (Chianti, Barbera), Pinot Noir, or off-dry whites. Lagers and wheat beers also work.

name: Bolognese Arancini
description: Fried risotto balls with bolognese stuffing.
serverNotes: Sicilian fried risotto balls stuffed with rich bolognese. Crispy outside, creamy inside. Classic Italian street food. Pairs beautifully with Italian reds (Chianti, Barbera, Nero d'Avola), or sparkling wines. Great with Italian beers.

name: Prosciutto Wrapped Mozzarella
description: Pan seared, drizzled with balsamic reduction.
serverNotes: Fresh mozzarella wrapped in prosciutto, pan-seared, finished with balsamic reduction. Elegant, simple, delicious. Pairs perfectly with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Soave), Prosecco, or light reds. Crisp lagers complement nicely.

name: P.L.T. & Mozzarella
description: A tower of fresh prosciutto, lobster meat, tomato, fresh mozzarella, basil and balsamic reduction.
serverNotes: Luxurious tower of prosciutto, lobster, tomato, mozzarella, basil, balsamic. Elegant, show-stopping appetizer. Pairs excellently with Champagne, Chardonnay, Italian whites, or rosé. Premium choice for special occasions.

name: Tuna Tartare
description: Chopped Yellowfin tuna, caper, shallot, Calabrian chili, potato gaufrette, seasoned crumb.
serverNotes: Fresh Yellowfin tuna tartare with capers, shallot, Calabrian chili, potato gaufrette. Light, fresh, sophisticated. Pairs beautifully with Champagne, Sauvignon Blanc, Pinot Grigio, or dry Riesling. Also excellent with sake or crisp lagers.

name: House Made Ricotta
serverNotes: Creamy house-made ricotta with baked crostini, local honey. Simple, elegant, delicious. Pairs wonderfully with Italian whites (Vermentino, Pinot Grigio), sparkling wines, or light reds. Perfect with wheat beers or Prosecco.

name: Pan Fried Fresh Mozzarella
serverNotes: Crispy pan-fried mozzarella with marinara sauce. Classic Italian comfort food. Crowd-pleaser. Pairs perfectly with Italian reds (Chianti, Sangiovese), Italian whites, or Prosecco. Great with Italian beers like Peroni.

name: Fried Brussels Sprouts
description: Deep fried until crispy, tossed with Parmesan cheese and crispy prosciutto, served with sundried tomato aioli.
serverNotes: Crispy fried Brussels sprouts with Parmesan, prosciutto, sundried tomato aioli. Savory, addictive. Pairs well with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino), light reds, or sparkling wines. IPAs and wheat beers complement nicely.

name: Truffle Frites with Parmigiano
description: Thin cut fries with fresh Parmesan and truffle oil.
serverNotes: Crispy thin-cut fries with Parmesan, truffle oil. Indulgent, luxurious. Pairs excellently with Italian reds (Barolo, Barbaresco, Nebbiolo), Champagne, or full-bodied whites. Great with craft lagers or Belgian ales.

name: Garlic Cheese Bread
description: Soft Italian bread with roasted garlic butter topped with a blend of mozzarella and provolone cheeses, served with marinara sauce.
serverNotes: Classic garlic cheese bread with mozzarella, provolone, marinara. Comfort food favorite. Pairs well with Italian reds (Chianti, Montepulciano), or any red wine. Perfect with Italian beers or as a starter with any meal.

name: Italian Meat & Cheese Board
description: Prosciutto di Parma, salami, bresaola, gorgonzola dolce, pepperoncini cheese, truffle goat cheese, honeycomb, pickled onions, whole grain mustard sauce and grilled bread.
serverNotes: Premium Italian charcuterie board with prosciutto, salami, bresaola, artisan cheeses (gorgonzola, pepperoncini, truffle goat), honeycomb, pickled onions, grilled bread. Perfect for sharing. Pairs wonderfully with Italian reds (Chianti, Barolo, Brunello), bold whites, or sparkling wines. Great with craft beers.
